      • saveByCity

        public void saveByCity(android.net.Uri uri,
                       java.lang.String country,
                       java.lang.String city)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This is a method for saving photos by GPS tags.
        Parameters:
        uri - It is the URI of the photo that the user wants to save.
        country - It is the country where the user wants to save the photo.
        city - It is the city where the user wants to save the photo.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • savePhotoByDate

        public java.lang.String savePhotoByDate(android.net.Uri uri,
                                        java.lang.String date)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        This is a method for saving photos by date.
        Parameters:
        uri - It is the URI of the photo that the user wants to save.
        date - That's the date the photo was taken.
        Returns:
        city City, where the photo was saved, or null if the city wasn't found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveMultimediaByDate

        public java.lang.String saveMultimediaByDate(android.net.Uri uri,
                                             java.lang.String date,
                                             java.lang.String type)
        This is a method for saving multimedia by date.
        Parameters:
        uri - It is the URI of the multimedia that the user wants to save.
        date - That's the date the multimedia was taken.
        type - This parameter shows that it's audio or video.
        Returns:
        City, where the multimedia was saved, or null if the city wasn't found

      • proofBitmapFaces

        public boolean proofBitmapFaces(android.net.Uri uri)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This method checks if there are faces in the photo or not.
        Parameters:
        uri - This is the URI of the photo that the user wants to check for faces.
        Returns:
        True is faces were found, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • proofPhoto

        public java.lang.String proofPhoto(android.net.Uri uri)
        This function allows the user to check whether a certain photo has been saved in the system before or not.
        Parameters:
        uri - This is the URI of the photo that the user wants to check.
        Returns:
        The city where this picture was already saved, or null

      • proofMultimedia

        public java.lang.String proofMultimedia(android.net.Uri uri)
        This function allows the user to check whether a certain multimedia has been saved in the system before or not.
        Parameters:
        uri - This is the URI of the multimedia that the user wants to check.
        Returns:
        The city where this multimedia was already saved, or null
